channel.title: YangYang (杨杨) - Homepage
channel.description: YangYang's Homepage, computer technology MS student at South-Central Minzu University, focusing on Multimodal Medical Image Analysis and Computer Vision

item.title: SFDMNet: Symmetric Feature Distillation and Contrastive Fusion for Multimodal Brain Tumor Segmentation
item.description: A novel deep learning model for multimodal brain tumor segmentation using symmetric feature distillation and contrastive fusion. Currently under review. Authors: Yang Yang, Xiao Zhang, Jianlin Zhu, Pan Lai, Bo Yang, Meng Shi, Huazhu Fu, Yang Wen, Jin Huang, Bin Sheng.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: Hi-ERMNet: A Hierarchical Edge Refinement Network and Lightweight Transformer Encoders for Retinal Vasculature Segmentation
item.description: A hierarchical edge refinement network with lightweight transformer encoders for retinal vasculature segmentation. Submitted to IEEE Transactions on Image Processing (TIP), SCI-Q1. Authors: Yang Yang, Xuyan Huang, Xiao Zhang, Jianlin Zhu, Pan Lai, Bo Yang, Meng Shi, Zimao Li, Jun Tie, Huazhu Fu, Yang Wen, Jin Huang, Bin Sheng.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: HSFPN-Det: An Effective Model for Detecting Rice Pests and Diseases
item.description: A novel deep learning model for rice pest and disease detection, accepted by The Visual Computer (TVC) journal (SCI-Q3, IF=2.9). Authors: Yang Yang, Yuxin Hong, Wenjie Yu, Xiao Zhang, Bo Yang, Meng Shi, Yangguang Sun, Jun Wang, Jianlin Zhu.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)

item.title: An Improved YOLOv8-Based Rice Pest and Disease Detection Method
item.description: We propose an improved YOLOv8-based method for accurate detection of rice pests and diseases. Published in Computer Graphics International Conference (CGI) 2024. Authors: Yang Yang, Jianlin Zhu, Bo Yang, Xiao Zhang, Jin Huang.
item.author: yangyang@mail.scuec.edu.cn (Yang Yang)
